title: Forum Gamer
description: A gaming community platform featuring game-specific zones (FPS, MOBA, RPG, Sports), trending discussions, live chat, and real-time thread updates. Built with modern tech stack for Indonesian gamers to connect and share gaming experiences.

title: Web Kasir - Point of Sale System
description: A comprehensive web-based POS system with features including product management, transaction handling, thermal receipt printing, sales reporting (daily/monthly/yearly), customer management, and barcode integration. Built with Django and PostgreSQL.

title: WordPress Custom Card Plugin
description: A custom WordPress plugin that adds card widgets to the Elementor page builder. Features include ACF integration, button customization options, flexible styling settings, and responsive design support. Built to enhance content presentation with modern UI components.

title: Website Twins Rental Motor Banyuwangi
description:
Twins Rental Motor Banyuwangi is a motorcycle rental website built with WordPress, designed to streamline the motorbike booking process for both local residents and tourists visiting Banyuwangi.

Key features include:

A complete listing of available motorbikes with daily and weekly pricing

Quick and simple booking form

WhatsApp integration for instant communication

Fully responsive and mobile-friendly design

Local SEO optimization to improve Google visibility

This website helps digitize the rental experience, making it easier, faster, and more reliable for users to find and book motorbikes onlineâ€”anytime, anywhere.
